ai-patthana18.7:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma, third in the place he had allowed to,
ai-patthana18.7:0.3_0: On his eyes are pair of priceless,
ai-patthana18.7:1.1_0: for the sake of defining the Dhamma, not the cause of condition.
ai-patthana18.7:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana18.7:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:2.1_0: for he does not give rise to the cause, for the sake of non-existence,
ai-patthana18.7:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:3.1_0: mind doesn’t give rise to the cause, without cause,
ai-patthana18.7:3.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:4.1_0: for the sake of the mind ...
ai-patthana18.7:4.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:5.1_0: for the sake of health, not for the sake of a teaching,
ai-patthana18.7:5.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:6.1_0: or causes and conditions for the sake of mental discontent,
ai-patthana18.7:6.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:7.1_0: for the sake of a thought with the mind, not the cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.7:7.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana18.7:7.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:8.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:9.1_0: for the sake of his mind is not the cause,
ai-patthana18.7:9.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana18.7:9.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:10.1_0: or cause he does not give rise to the thought of thought.
ai-patthana18.7:10.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:11.1_0: Because of a cause of consciousness arises dependent on the mind and no cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.7:11.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:12.1_0: Only mental consciousness arises dependent on the mind, not the cause or condition.
ai-patthana18.7:12.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:13.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:14.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:15.1_0: Through the mind that arises conditioned by way of mind, not with the reason.
ai-patthana18.7:15.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:16.1_0: Not for the sake of her teaching, not for the sake of (which declarations).
ai-patthana18.7:16.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:17.1_0: Because of a cause of thought, for the sake of the mind, not for the sake of the eighteen consciousnesses.
ai-patthana18.7:17.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:18.1_0: mind is not the reason why it doesn’t give rise to the eighteen mental preoccupations.
ai-patthana18.7:18.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:19.1_0: Telling the mind is produced by causes and reasons, not without reason.
ai-patthana18.7:19.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:20.1_0: He doesn’t give rise to the eighteen mental preoccupations. It doesn’t give rise to the cause of reason for the sake of the mind.
ai-patthana18.7:20.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:21.1_0: Because of that it doesn’t give rise to the kept rolling on connection with mind, without consciousness.
ai-patthana18.7:21.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana18.7:22.1_0: You don’t give rise to the eighteen mental rolling by the mind.
ai-patthana18.7:22.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
